parsing_result:
# Viewing Pictures

Pictures can be viewed in the viewfinder or LCD monitor.

To view pictures full frame, press !Play Button.

!Camera Display and Picture

Additional pictures can be viewed by pressing the focus stick (focus lever) left or right or rotating the front command dial. Press the focus stick or rotate the dial right to view pictures in the order recorded, left to view pictures in reverse order. Keep the focus stick pressed to scroll rapidly to the desired frame.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> Pictures taken using other cameras are marked with a !Gift Image Icon ("gift image") icon to warn that they may not display correctly and that playback zoom may not be available.

## Two Memory Cards

If two memory cards are inserted, you can press and hold the !Play Button button to choose a card for playback. You can also select a card using the **PLAY BACK MENU > SWITCH SLOT** option.
